/work/doc/pages/SessionStates.md
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 \defgroup session-states Session States
2 \ingroup advanced-programming
3 
4 \details
5 
6 The OnixS::B3::BOE::SessionStateId::Enum reflects all session states that can occur during its
7 lifetime and what a specific state means.
8 
9 The OnixS::B3::BOE::Session::state member returns the current session state.
10 
11 \section tracking-session-state-change Tracking Session State Changes
12 
13 To be notified about a session state change, override the OnixS::B3::BOE::SessionListener::onStateChange,
14 and supply the class instance to the OnixS::B3::BOE::Session's constructor.
15 
16 \section state-change-example Example
17 \snippet SessionStates.cpp sessionStates
